title: Examination of surplus lines broker's
context: ยง431:8-318 Examination of surplus lines broker&rsquo;s accounts and records. Whenever deemed necessary the commissioner may examine the records and accounts of any surplus lines broker to determine whether the broker is conducting business in accordance with the requirements of this article.
